prompt: Design a map view page with a full-screen map and a vibrant color scheme. Include a top app bar with the title 'Vivid Map' in white text, a bright pink background (Colors.pink), and a white back arrow icon. Add a floating action button in the bottom-right corner with a yellow GPS icon (Colors.yellow) and a pink background (Colors.pink). The map area should have a light pink background (Colors.pink[100]) with a subtle gradient (from pink[100] to pink[50]). Use Material Design with bold colors and smooth transitions, ensuring a lively and engaging interface.
